summary: Defines a collection of reusable UI component classes and helper utilities used by Metaflow cards to render artifacts, errors, images, markdown, tables, progress bars, user info, and Vega/Altair visualizations, handling serialization, rendering, and dynamic updates.
business_intent: Provide Metaflow users with a simple, extensible way to embed rich, interactive visual elements and diagnostic information into workflow cards, enhancing observability, reporting, and user experience.
